resources.string:
MEGA provides user controlled encrypted cloud storage and chat through standard web browsers, together with dedicated apps for mobile devices. Unlike other cloud storage providers, your data is encrypted and decrypted by your client devices only and never by us.

Upload your files from your smartphone or tablet then search, store, download, stream, view, share, rename or delete your files any time, from any device, anywhere. Share folders with your contacts and see their updates in real time. The encryption process means we cannot access or reset your password so you MUST remember it (unless you have your Recovery Key backed up) or you will lose access to your stored files.

End-to-end user encrypted MEGA video chat allows for total privacy, and has been available through the browser since 2016. It has been extended to our mobile app, with chat history accessible across multiple devices. Users can also easily add files to a chat from their MEGA Cloud Drive.

MEGA offers a generous 50 GB free storage for all registered users with bonus achievements, and offers paid plans with much higher limits:


Pro Lite subscription: 4.99 € per month or 49.99 € per year gives you 400 GB of storage space and 1 TB of transfer quota per month.
Pro I subscription: 9.99 € per month or 99.99 € per year gives you 2 TB of storage space and 2 TB of transfer quota per month.
Pro II subscription: 19.99 € per month or 199.99 € per year gives you 8 TB of storage space and 8 TB of transfer quota per month.
Pro III subscription: 29.99 € per month or 299.99 € per year gives you 16 TB of storage space and 16 TB of transfer quota per month.

Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the Play Store icon on your mobile device, sign in with your Google ID (if you haven’t already done so) and then click on the MEGA app. You’ll be able to manage your subscription there.

App Permissions:
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -> Download your files from MEGA to your device and upload files from your device to MEGA
CAMERA -> Take a picture and upload your photos to MEGA
READ_CONTACTS -> Easily add contacts from your device as MEGA contacts
RECORD_AUDIO and CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT (mic and camera) -> MEGA provides for end-to-end encrypted audio/video calls


To enhance users’ confidence in the MEGA system, all of the client-side code is published, so interested security researchers can evaluate the encryption process. The code of our mobile app is located on: https://github.com/meganz/android 

For more info, please check our website:
See https://mega.nz/terms 


Desktop - https://mega.nz/
MEGA is Cloud Storage with Powerful Always-On Privacy.

Your password unlocks your Recovery Key

Your data is only readable through a chain of decryption operations that begins with your master encryption key, which we store encrypted with your password. This means that if you lose your password, your Recovery Key can no longer be decrypted, and you can no longer decrypt your data.
Exporting the Recovery Key and keeping it in a secure location enables you to set a new password without data loss.
An external attacker cannot gain access to your account with just your key. A password reset requires both the key and access to your email.
Copy the Recovery Key to clipboard or save it as text file
The Recovery Key has been successfully copied
If you have a backup of your Recovery Key, you can reset your password by selecting YES. No data will be lost.

You can still export your Recovery Key now if you have an active MEGA session in another browser on this or any other computer. If you don’t, you can no longer decrypt your existing account, but you can start a new one under the same email address by selecting NO.
Do you have a backup of your Recovery Key?

resources.string: An error has occurred. The chat history has not been successfully cleared
Protects your chat with end-to-end (user controlled) encryption, providing essential safety assurances:
The system ensures that the data received is truly from the specified sender, and its content has not been manipulated during transit.
Only the author and intended recipients are able to decipher and read the content.

Two-Factor Authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
Why do you need two-factor authentication?

Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the six digit code only you have access to.
Scan or copy the seed to your Authenticator App.
Be sure to backup this seed to a safe place in case you lose your device.

Next time you login to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator App.

Camera Uploads is an essential feature for any mobile device and we have got you covered. Create your account now.
%s is a password protected PDF document. Please enter the password to open the PDF.
You have entered the wrong password, please try again.
The password you have entered is not valid.
It is not possible to open the file. It is an unknown file type or it has not been possible to unzip the file successfully.
It is not possible to play media files while there is a call in progress.
%s started a group call. Tap to join.
You are currently on a call
This conversation will no longer be accessible through the chat link once it has been removed.
Encrypted Key Rotation does not allow you to get a chat link without creating a new group chat.
Do you want to create a new group chat and get a chat link?
Encryption key rotation is slightly more secure, but does not allow you to create a chat link and new participants will not see past messages.
You have joined the chat successfully.
File already downloaded. Copied to the selected path.
To join this call you have to end your current call.
To join this call you have to end or hold the current call.
Please enter a valid file or folder link
Please enter a valid chat link
You have pasted a chat link.
You have pasted a contact link.
People can join your group by using this link.
To create a chat link you must name the group.
Invite contacts and start chatting securely with MEGA’s encrypted chat.
Start chatting securely with your contacts using end-to-end encryption
Hi! Have secure conversations on MEGA with me and get up to 20 GB+ free storage. %1$s
Tap and hold to record, release to send.
This voice message is not available
Get %1$s free when you add your phone number. This makes it easier for your contacts to find you on MEGA.
Add your phone number to MEGA. This makes it easier for your contacts to find you on MEGA.
It is not possible to record voice messages while there is a call in progress.
An error occurred while trying to upload the voice message.
User management is only available from a desktop web browser.
You cannot remove %1$s as a contact because they are part of your Business account.
There has been a problem with your last payment. Please access MEGA using a desktop browser for more information.
There has been a problem processing your payment. MEGA is limited to view only until this issue has been fixed in a desktop web browser.
Your account is currently [B]suspended[/B]. You can only browse your data.
While MEGA can not access to your data, your business account administrator does have the ability to control and view the Camera Uploads in your user account
Contact your business account administrator to resolve the issue and activate your account.
When you log out, files from your Offline section will be deleted from your device.
When you log out, ongoing transfers will be cancelled.
When you log out, files from your Offline section will be deleted from your device and ongoing transfers will be cancelled.
Please select one or more contacts.
Error. The folder %1$s was not created
Your account has been temporarily locked for your safety.
[A]Please verify your email address[/A] and follow the steps in MEGA’s email to unlock your account.
Email already sent. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
It is possible that you are using the same password for your MEGA account as for other services, and that at least one of these other services has suffered a data breach.
Your password leaked and is now being used by bad actors to log into your accounts, including, but not limited to, your MEGA account.
An error occurred while trying to add the nickname
You do not have the permissions required to revert this file. In order to continue, we can create a new file with the reverted data. Would you like to proceed?
Version was created as a new file successfully.
Are you sure you want to stop sharing these %1$d folders?
Your transfers have been interrupted. Upgrade your account or wait %s to continue.
The file does not exist in the Cloud Drive.

plurals.name: over_disk_quota_paywall_text
plurals.item: We have contacted you by email to %1$s on %2$s, but you still have %3$s files taking up %4$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %5$s.
We have contacted you by email to %1$s on %2$s and %3$s, but you still have %4$s files taking up %5$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %6$s.

resources.string: We have contacted you by email to %1$s, but you still have %2$s files taking up %3$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %4$s.
[B]You have [M]%s[/M] left to upgrade[/B]. After that, your data is subject to deletion.
[B]You have to upgrade[/B]. Your data is currently subject to deletion.
[B]You must act immediately to save your data.[/B]
This is best done in real life by meeting face to face. If you have another already-verified channel such as verified OTR or PGP, you may also use that.
Updating credentials. Please try again later.
Your phone number has been removed successfully.
The account you’re trying to reset is blocked.
Your account has been blocked. Please contact support@mega.nz
Your account has been deactivated by your administrator. Please contact your business account administrator for further details.
Your account has been removed by your administrator. Please contact your business account administrator for further details.
This operation will remove your current phone number and start the process of associating a new phone number with your account.
This will remove your associated phone number from your account. If you later choose to add a phone number you will be required to verify it.
No available GIFs. Please try again later
Unpause transfers to proceed with your upload.
Enabled special info for chat messages
Disabled special info for chat messages
You have reached the maximum limit of %d reactions.
This message has reached the maximum limit of %d reactions.
[A]%1$s[/A][B] changed the message clearing time to[/B][A] %2$s[/A][B].[/B]
Delete all messages and files shared in this conversation. This action is irreversible.
Automatically delete messages older than a certain amount of time.
Clear the full message history for this conversation?
The priority change of the transfer ”%1$s” failed.
Export link and decryption key separately.
MEGA Pro users have exclusive access to additional link safety features making your account even more secure.

Our end-to-end encryption system requires a unique key automatically generated for this file. A link with this key is created by default, but you can export the decryption key separately for an added layer of security.
Share the key for this link?
Share the password for this link?
MEGA needs your permission in order to share files.

We use local storage and similar technologies (’Cookies’) to provide our services to you, enhance your experience with our services and customize the adverts you see, including through third parties. Accept our use of Cookies from the beginning of your visit or customise Cookies in Cookie Settings. Read more in our [A]Cookie Policy[/A].
Cookie Settings changes have been saved
Essential for providing you important functionality and secure access to our services. For this reason, they do not require consent.
Allow us to remember certain display and formatting settings you choose. Not accepting these Cookies will mean we won’t be able to remember some things for you such as your preferred screen layout.

Help us to understand how you use our services and provide us data that we can use to make improvements. Not accepting these Cookies will mean we will have less data available to us to help design improvements.

Used by us and our approved advertising partners to customise the adverts you see on our services and on other websites based on your browsing history. Not accepting these Cookies means we may show advertisements that are less relevant.

These are Cookies which are controlled by someone other than us; we use these Cookies to provide the types of functionality described above. Not accepting these Cookies will have different implications depending on what type of Cookie each third party Cookie is. Click on “More Information” below for details on all the third party Cookies we use.
%s is not in your contacts list
Discard changes and close the editor?
File not saved to %1$s. Try again.
File is too large and can’t be opened or previewed.
To proceed you need to type a file extension
You may not be able to access this file if you change the extension from “.%1$s” to “.%2$s”
You may not be able to access this file if you add the “.%1$s” extension
You may not be able to access this file if you remove the “.%1$s” extension
There is already a file with the same name
There is already an item with the same name
Automatically backup your photos and videos to your Cloud Drive.
